CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "text"/>
<xsl:template match = "ScientificProtocolInfo"> <xsl:variable name = "PIDs" select = "concat(ProtocolIDs/PrimaryID/IDString, ';', ProtocolIDs/OtherID/IDString,';', ProtocolTitle[@Type='Original'])"/> <xsl:value-of select="substring($PIDs,1,255)"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
